I'm sorry, I meant to say this happens after I install the AspectJ Eclipe Plugin
1.1.4.

I've freshly installed the same M6 on Windows and got the same problem. Are
there any worksround?
There was no AspectJ involved for me on Windows.
Okay after I uninstalled JDK 1.4.03 and installed 1.4.2.
I have the same problem after the AspectJ install on 3M6

Unfortunately, AJDT 1.1.4 works only with Eclipse 3M4 or earlier.
To work with Eclipse 3M8, AJDT 1.1.7 is required, which will be available soon.
Eclipse versions between 3M4 and 3M8 are not supported.

AJDT 1.1.7 has been released which works on Eclipse 3.0M8 and the AJDT 
download page on the website has been updated to correctly reflect which AJDT 
versions work with which Eclipse versions.
Fixed in 1.1.7 which works on M8
